name: Yummy & Legal
description:
A cooking game developed for Resist Jam which is about government bans and their negative effects on our daily lives. I couldn't complete the game in jam's time, but finished developing it after.

Click to move, pickup pieces and use tools, mouse wheel to change active picked piece.

Download Windows version for a better experience (Unity WebGL has some UI issues)

Source code at https://github.com/sapsari/Yummy-Legal
